summary: This mod replaces the unimpressive mesh of the vanilla bears with a more realistic, grizzled and savage looking bear mesh. This replaces all vanilla bears in game.
descriptionHtml:
[center] ﻿[size=3]This mod replaces the unimpressive mesh of the vanilla bears with a more realistic, grizzled and savage looking bear mesh. This replaces all vanilla bears in game[/size]

If you're like me and have been disappointed in the vanilla bears of Skyrim then this mod is for you.   [size=3]After comparing lots of pics, paintings and sculptures, of different bears, and working in the confines of the vanilla mesh, I softened most of the hard edges and enlarged the torso and back of the vanilla mesh, to give it a more realistic, ferocious and savage appearance.   These are the savage bears I've always wanted to see in the game. [/size]
[size=3]Hope you like them as much as I do.[/size]

[size=2]This is my first mod and [/size]I'm open to any feedback or constructive criticism, but keep in mind that I have a full time career and I'm in college part time, so it maybe a while before I can respond to any questions or comments. Please be patient with any questions or concerns and I will respond as soon as I can.
Thank you[/center][center]﻿[color=#00ffff]
[/color][/center][center][size=4][b][color=#00ffff][Mod Compatibility][/color]
[/b][/size][size=3]Should be fully compatible with any texture mods for bears.

[/size]Will be coming to Skyrim Special Edition Soon!


[b][color=#00ffff][Recommended Mods][/color]
[size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86559]Better Bears[/url]﻿[/size][size=3][color=#1e84cc] [/color][color=#ffffff]by [/color][/size][/b][size=3]aviform[/size]
[size=4]
[/size][color=#00ffff][size=4][b][Installation]
[/b][/size][/color][size=3]Recommend using Nexus Mod Manager 
[/size]




[/center][center]﻿[/center]
author: Rougeshot
